title: Mirage Gaming Hosting 5v5 Tryouts for Competitive 5s Team Roster
body:
Mirage Gaming is building 2 competitive 5s teams to compete in Clash, Tournaments, and LoL Leagues.  The majority of the rosters are being filled with Tryouts hosted over the course of the next few weeks.  Our next tryout upcoming tryout date is: **Tuesday, April 24th** 

We are recruiting all positions, with no current rank restriction.  This is subject to change as the tryouts continue.  

Tryouts consist of a 5v5 setting, with Mirage Coaching stuff running organization and champion select.  During tryouts, we are NOT evaluating the outcome of the matches.  Please bear in mind as you move through our process that our focus is on evaluating the individual.

If you wish to apply, please do so on the forum here.  The application is embedded, and should allow you to complete it without leaving the site.   

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdz03U0bvLqm9FL1ERIXnjzsFHIfclE5B1X0IOrgTIiTwW9Tw/viewform?embedded=true" 


---

Mirage Gaming is a multi-platform gaming organization that is building 2 new sister League of Legend teams.  In the past, Mirage has: 

* Placed a roster in the LAN challenger scene 
* Built NA rosters from Silver players to Master tier over 2 years 
* Competed in other smaller-community games such as Grand Chase at the professional level

Mirage Gaming Has:

* Experienced management
* High caliber coaching staff
* Various analyst members 
* Video-editing staff 
* Org. Website



[Click here if the app embed isn't working](https://goo.gl/forms/5kT0mSanwbI1MCwt1)

----
**Additional Notes:** 
If you would like to discuss options for staff recruitment, or for general inquiries, please visit our discord https://discord.gg/p2CJx and message our general manager "Tae"

replies.body: If I already have a premade team made, can we all tryout and be on the same team?
Hey Penguin can you get in touch with me please i have a question add IGN Brownjo
